author: John
title: Daily Afternoon Randomness (49 Photos)
text:
26 27 
theCHIVE is now ranked the #1 Kindest Business on the planet. The Chivers’ Random Acts of Kindess seems to have no limits right now. Taking a little extra second from your day to help out another has become the one great hope in America. Turns out theCHIVE had it right all along. Now we must continue to lead. 
So please go to the Chive Nation page here to submit your RAK and share it with the world. And please consider sharing a link to your favorite charity today on your social media or donating $5 to our most recent flash campaign! 28 
And a special thanks to our everyday heroes, our nurses, first responders, and police. Some heroes don’t wear capes, but most have their KCCO’s on right under their uniform. And you know you’re in good hands when that happens. 29
